title: Badass Brambilla: the day F1's 'Monza Gorilla' won at deadly Österreichring
summary: Vittorio Brambilla won just a single grand prix in his Formula 1 career but, writesMatt Bishop, it was a spectacularly skilful and determined victory at an Austrian race blanketed by rain and tragedy

qa_pairs.question: Who is known as the 'Monza Gorilla' in Formula 1?
At which circuit did Vittorio Brambilla achieve his only Formula 1 victory?
What weather conditions characterized the race where Brambilla won his Grand Prix?
